mapper.delete: delete from sys_parameter_config where parameter_code in (select parameter_code from sys_parameter_define where parameter_type = #{typeCode})
mapper.select: select pd.parameter_code, pd.parameter_type, pd.parameter_name, pd.element_type, pd.ddt_code, pd.lov_code, pd.ds_code, pd.display_order, pd.description, ddi.item_name element_type_name, ddt.type_name ddt_text, sld.lov_name lov_text, dsd.struct_name ds_text from sys_parameter_define pd left join sys_data_dict_item ddi on ( ddi.type_code = 'element_type' and ddi.item_code = pd.element_type ) left join sys_data_dict_type ddt on (pd.ddt_code = ddt.type_code) left join sys_lov_define sld on (pd.lov_code = sld.lov_code) left join sys_data_struct_define dsd on (pd.ds_code = dsd.struct_code) where pd.parameter_type = #{typeCode} order by pd.display_order

select pd.parameter_code, pd.parameter_type, pd.parameter_name, pd.element_type, pd.ddt_code, pd.lov_code, pd.ds_code, pd.display_order, pd.description, ddi.item_name element_type_name, ddt.type_name ddt_text, sld.lov_name lov_text, dsd.struct_name ds_text from sys_parameter_define pd left join sys_data_dict_item ddi on ( ddi.type_code = 'element_type' and ddi.item_code = pd.element_type ) left join sys_data_dict_type ddt on (pd.ddt_code = ddt.type_code) left join sys_lov_define sld on (pd.lov_code = sld.lov_code) left join sys_data_struct_define dsd on (pd.ds_code = dsd.struct_code) where pd.parameter_code = #{parameterCode}

select pd.parameter_code, pd.parameter_type, pd.parameter_name, pd.element_type, pd.ddt_code, pd.lov_code, pd.ds_code, pd.display_order, pd.description, ddi.item_name element_type_name, ddt.type_name ddt_text, sld.lov_name lov_text, dsd.struct_name ds_text, pc.parameter_value from sys_parameter_define pd left join sys_parameter_config pc on (pd.parameter_code = pc.parameter_code) left join sys_data_dict_item ddi on ( ddi.type_code = 'element_type' and ddi.item_code = pd.element_type ) left join sys_data_dict_type ddt on (pd.ddt_code = ddt.type_code) left join sys_lov_define sld on (pd.lov_code = sld.lov_code) left join sys_data_struct_define dsd on (pd.ds_code = dsd.struct_code) where pd.parameter_type = #{typeCode} order by pd.display_order
